title: Tiga Sushi and Asian Bistro
typeOfFood: Ovo, Japanese, Thai, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Catering, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cross-cultural Asian restaurant, with sushi, Thai curries, and Chinese dishes. Vegan options in all categories, fish sauce is left out of most Thai dishes, and sometimes has as an off-menu special "The Ultimate Vegan," a sushi roll with mango and asparagus (ask for it if not on special, kitchen can always make it).
